alert.note: Alert for Gasconade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:09PM CDT until July 16 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Gasconade County in east central Missouri... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 209 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Sterling, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rosebud, Mount Sterling, Swiss, Drake, and Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
